title: FIFA suspends Sepp Blatter and Michel Platini for 90 days
text: WQOW - Your Official Packers Station FIFA suspends Sepp Blatter and Michel Platini for 90 days (AP Photo/Michael Probst, file). FILE - In this June 1, 2011 file photo Swiss FIFA President Joseph Blatter, right, and French UEFA President Michel Platini walk together at the 61st FIFA Congress in Zurich, Switzerland.
